00023 #include "chipstream/EngineUtil.h"
00024 #include "chipstream/apt-export-impute/ExportDataFilesEngine.h"
00025 #include "util/AptVersionInfo.h"
00026 #include "util/BaseEngine.h"
00027 #include "util/Fs.h"
00028 #include "util/LogStream.h"
00029 #include "util/PgOptions.h"
00030 #include "util/Util.h"
00031 
00032 #ifndef WIN32
00033 #include <unistd.h>
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 
00037 
00038 /** Everybody's favorite function... */
00039 int main(int argc,const char* argv[]) {
00040   ofstream logOut;
00041   LogStream log;
00042   string logName;
00043     
00044   try {
00045 
00046     ExportDataFilesEngine engine;
00047     
00048     const string version = AptVersionInfo::version();
00049     const string cvsId = AptVersionInfo::cvsId();
00050     const string versionToReport = AptVersionInfo::versionToReport();
00051     const string execGuid = affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid();
00052 
00053     
00054     /* Parse options. */
00055     engine.setUsage("apt-chp-to-table - A program for converting genotype CHP files to the\n"
00056                     "various table output files for calls and confidences.\n"
00057                     "usage:\n"
00058                     "   apt-chp-to-table ... \\\n"
00059                     "        ...");
00060     
00061     // Setup Options
00062     engine.parseArgv(argv);
00063     Verbose::setLevel(engine.getOptInt("verbose"));
00064     const string progName = Fs::basename(engine.getProgName());
00065     engine.setOpt("command-line",engine.commandLine());
00066     engine.setOpt("program-name",progName);
00067     engine.setOpt("program-company","Affymetrix");
00068     engine.setOpt("program-version",version);
00069     engine.setOpt("program-cvs-id",cvsId);
00070     engine.setOpt("version-to-report",versionToReport);
00071     engine.setOpt("exec-guid",execGuid);
00072     if(argc == 1) { engine.setOpt("help","true"); }
00073     
00074     // Check Options. Will print out version/help if requested then exit.
00075     engine.checkOptions();
00076     
00077     // Set up the logging and message handlers.
00078     engine.openStandardLog("apt-chp-to-table.log",logOut,log);
00079     
00080     // Run the engine. Will exit with non-zero exit statis if fails.
00081     engine.run();
00082   } 
00083   catch(...) {
00084       Verbose::out(1,"Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
00085       // Close log files
00086       logOut.close();
00087       return 1;
00088   }
00089   // Close log files
00090   logOut.close();
00091     
00092   return 0;
00093 }
